title: following provisions of the Electoral Reform Act 2022 (No. 30 of 2022) shall
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Electoral Reform Act 2022
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Electoral Reform Act 2022 

(Commencement) Order 2023.
text_norm: 1 order may cited electoral reform act 2022 (commencement) order 2023

title: following provisions of the Electoral Reform Act 2022 (No. 30 of 2022) shall
heading: 2. The 9th day of February 2023 is appointed as the day on which the
text_raw:
2. The 9th day of February 2023 is appointed as the day on which the 
following provisions of the Electoral Reform Act 2022 (No. 30 of 2022) shall 
come into operation: 

(a) 

paragraphs (h) to (k) of subsection (1) of section 4 of Part 1; 

(b) 

subsections (3) and (4) of section 4 of Part 1; 

(c) Part 2 (insofar as it is not already in operation); 

(d) 

section 98 of Chapter 1 of Part 3; 

(e) Part 9. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

8 February, 2023. 

DARRAGH O’BRIEN, 

Minister for Housing, Local Government and Heritage. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 10th February, 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [32] 3

title: following provisions of the Electoral Reform Act 2022 (No. 30 of 2022) shall
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

In exercise of the powers conferred on the Minister for Housing, Local 
Government and Heritage by section 1(5) of the Electoral Reform Act 2022 
(No. 30 of 2022), this Order appoints 9 February 2023 as the day on which 
certain provisions in Parts 1, 2, 3 and 9 of that Act come into operation. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [32]
